column4: What's the *absolute* best way to install x64 flash on Ubuntu? I've tried downloading from the Adobe Lab site and using the nonfree version in the repos, each time I have problems (I'm often unable to interact with flash...i.e. press play on videos, etc).
Flash x64 is still early beta, many people are experiencing bugs. Doesn't really matter how you install it, the software's simply not finished yet.
Always the same with proprietary software..
